channel.title: Text Mining on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Text Mining on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Hideous Progeny: Tidytext Analysis of Frankenstein
item.description: The Moden Prometheus Pursuit for Frankenstein Begins Emptiness Filled Destruction and Creation Of Man, Of Life A Big Ending Uncontrollable Feelings Waves of Emotions Down the Precipice Fear the Daemon Ice and Hearts of Fire And now, once again, I bid my hideous progeny go forth and prosper. — Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley (London, 15 October 1831) The Moden Prometheus Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley’s Frankenstein (The Modern Prometheus) is one of the best stories anyone can read.

item.title: The Crusade: Text Mining Trivium Songs
item.description: A View of Mining Lyrics Into the Mouth of R We March Pull Harder on the Strings of Lyrics with geniusR Text Dismantled Anthem (We are the Functions) Album That Spawned the Most Words Tread the Words Torn Between Term Frequency and Inverse Document Frequency Negativity Thrives These Sentiments Can’t Tear Us Apart (Warning: NSFW Language) A View of Mining Lyrics Trivium is my favorite heavy metal band.
